subject: Archive the plan
description:
**Type:** Task

Archive this plan:
1. Create folder `fibonacci-generator` in `./plans/completed`
2. Move plan into `./plans/completed/fibonacci-generator/`
3. Read session IDs from plan
4. Move each `~/.claude/tasks/<session-id>` to `./plans/completed/fibonacci-generator/tasks`
5. Update any "in_progress" tasks to "completed"
6. Git push all changes
7. `gh pr ready`
8. `gh pr merge --auto --merge`

**Verification:** `ls ./plans/completed/fibonacci-generator/ && gh pr view --json state,isDraft` â†’ Plan archived, isDraft: false
